item.description:
Heres the Description for this Saturdays Event

We are bringing in DJ Disco Fries in the Front and DJ Su master in the Back room with additional live drumming for a whole lot of Hip Hop, International, (Arabic, Greek, Bhangra, Latin) and Top 40 at the all new Vintage Boston!

Located on 72 Broad St, Boston (Opposite the Hilton Hotel)...next to the Former Night Club Umbria! Please look it up on mapquest. Plenty of parking in the area.

For Mapquest Directions Click Here: Link to Addy

The night starts at 10:30 and we party till 2 am.

Front room: DJ Disco Fries from NYC - Hip Hop, Top 40, Mash Ups

Back room: DJ Su master- Desi, Bhangra, International, Arabic, Latin

- Live drummer
- Live Fashion show
- Free colorful bangles for the first 10 ladies.
- Free Bindis for the ladies.

DJ's, Live Drummer and more!

Email: Highrollerboston@gmail.com to be on the guestlist. Tickets: $10 on the Guestlist until Midnight! $15 After.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the Front Bar/Lounge at 10:30 PM. I will be wearing a Tan Jacket like in the picture.
item.why: Dj Disco Fries from NYC will be Spinning and theres a Live Fashion Show !!
item.name: BOSTON NIGHT LIFE GROUP (21 - 35) Meeting
